existing_features.title: Convert the eagle logo background from square to a perfect circular shape with fully symmetrical, clean smooth edges centered around the eagle head. Remove any visible square corners or masking artifacts.
Style the circular logo background with a dark base color, neon cyan glow, subtle futuristic gradient or glass effect, maintaining premium AI automation branding consistent with SwiftOps design.
Add a soft, elegant neon ring glow around the circular logo. Include an optional rotating or breathing light ring effect for a futuristic feel. The glow must not be overly bright.

Update the eagle logo animation to match the circular design with a 2-4 second sequence: circular energy ring forms first, neon outline draws the circle smoothly, robotic scan passes across the circle, eagle logo activates inside, eyes or neon accents power on, and final soft pulse glow stabilization. Avoid square reveal animations, hard edge transitions, and sudden pop effects.
Ensure the circular logo remains perfectly round on all screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile) with proportional scaling. Prevent any stretching or oval distortion.
Optimize logo animation performance to remain smooth and lightweight, ensuring fast loading on both mobile and desktop devices.
Remove the Gmail address 'zeeshan.automation06@gmail.com' completely from the header navigation, including both email text and email icon if present.
Automatically realign remaining header elements (logo, navigation menu, contact buttons) after email removal to ensure no empty spacing or gaps remain. Maintain balanced and centered layout.
Fix header alignment for desktop, tablet, and mobile views after email removal. Ensure the navbar remains balanced and centered across all responsive breakpoints.
Preserve existing neon styling, spacing, professional futuristic appearance, and consistent header height after removing the email address from the navigation bar.

new_feature_requests.summary: Convert eagle logo to circular background with neon glow
Update logo animation to circular design with energy ring formation
Remove email address from header navigation
